Name: AdaptaTank
About the game: stagnation Or Evolution The nation's future lays on the hands of two promising military engineers. Hada and Suru. Together wth their always evolving tank, you must fight against the traditionalists! Explore all the location around the city of Endring Upgrade your tank's weapons and defenses Evade and fight through the enemy lines AdaptaTank is a top-down shooter divided into multiple explorable levels. Played with keyboard and mouse
